name: Unknown Ian T Shirt
description:
Here is our first new design since our launch and it again features one of our musical heroes, Ian Curtis. This time Ian is nestled in behind the unmistakable artwork of Joy Division's seminal album Unknown Pleasures.

As always this t shirt is designed and printed in Glasgow on 100% Cotton Gildan Softstyle t shirts and the price includes shipping to the UK. Shipping to the rest of the world is charged at a flat rate of just £2.50

Sizing Info 
Measurement (inches)	 Width / Length

SMALL:	 18 / 27 
MEDIUM:	 20 / 28 
LARGE:	 22 / 29 

Design by Reuben Cameron.

name: What Bob Dylan Said T Shirt
description:
How many tees must a man look at before he finds the right one? The answer my friend is...right here.

Here's Bob Dylan's infamous quote: “A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and gets to bed at night, and in between he does what he wants to do.” 


Screen printed in Sunny Glasgow on 100% Gildan Softstyle T Shirt

Sizing Info
Measurement (inches)	 Width / Length

SMALL:	 18 / 27 
MEDIUM:	 20 / 28 
LARGE:	 22 / 29
X LARGE:   24 / 30

Exclusive Design by Reuben Cameron

name: What Ian Curtis Said T Shirt
description:
Ian Curtis' poignant words "Existence— well, what does it matter? I've existed for the best use i can. The past is now part of my future. 
The present is well out of hand."

Screen printed in Sunny Glasgow on 100% cotton Gildan Softstyle T Shirt

Sizing Info
Measurement (inches)	 Width / Length

SMALL:	 18 / 27 
MEDIUM:	 20 / 28 
LARGE:	 22 / 29
X LARGE:   24 / 30

Exclusive Design by Reuben Cameron

name: What Morrissey Said T Shirt
description:
Morrissey has said some pretty outrageous things in his time but this is probably his finest quote so why not slap it on your chest (even if you've got rubbish hair). 'I do maintain that if your hair is wrong, your entire life is wrong'

Also buying this T shirt will guarantee you get to go out more as you will always have a stitch to wear.

Screen printed in Sunny Glasgow on Gildan Softstyle T-Shirt giving the best quality and fit


Sizing Info
Measurement (inches)	 Width / Length

SMALL:	 18 / 27 
MEDIUM:	 20 / 28 
LARGE:	 22 / 29
X LARGE:   24 / 30

Exclusive Design by Reuben Cameron

description:
How many tees must a (wo)man look at before (s)he finds the right one? The answer my friend is...right here.

Here's Bob Dylan's infamous quote: “A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and gets to bed at night, and in between he does what he wants to do.”

Screen printed in Sunny Glasgow on 100% Gildan Softstyle Ladies Fitted T Shirt

name: What Morrissey Said Ladies Fit T Shirt
description: Ladies, the chances of getting the real Morrissey to go about on your chest telling the world of his wisdom is probably quite slim but we've sorted that issue for you by printing our What Morrissey Said design on a ladies fitted T shirt. Screen printed on 100% cotton Gildan Softstyle T shirt in Sunny Glasgow. Sizing Info Small: 8-10 Medium: 10-12 Ladies:12-14

name: What Bob Dylan Said Tote Bag
description: Save the World whilst shopping (or shoplifting if that's more your thing although we do not condone such behaviours) with one of our tote bags. Our bags can hold an array of other things as well as shopping. They are the perfect size for a notepad and a 13" laptop for those days when you need to go and write your memoirs at the local coffee shop. Or they also may or may not be able to hold 36 hamsters, 4 kittens, 1 puppy or 25 budgies although no guarantee is given as further research will be required to confirm these figures. Here is our What Bob Dylan Said screen printed on to a 100% cotton tote bag in Glasgow.
